metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: MySQL Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools MySQL Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools MySQL Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of MySQL database management.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of MySQL database management.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires basic SQL knowledge.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires basic SQL knowledge.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn MySQL step by step, from basic queries to advanced database management.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn MySQL step by step, from basic queries to advanced database management.

content.text: Get Started With MySQL »
content.html: Get Started With MySQL »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching MySQL? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching MySQL? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

Get Started
content.html: Get Started

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
MySQL, like any database system, is best learned through hands-on practice.
content.html: MySQL, like any database system, is best learned through hands-on practice.

content.text: Try this example using our editor:
content.html: Try this example using our editor:

content.code_html: SELECT * FROM Customers;

content.text: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and run websites.
content.html: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and run websites.

content.text: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces. That includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
content.html: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces. That includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.

content.text: MySQL is not hosted on W3Schools Spaces; you need to set it up on a platform like PlanetScale or a hosting provider and connect your application to it.
content.html: MySQL is not hosted on W3Schools Spaces; you need to set it up on a platform like PlanetScale or a hosting provider and connect your application to it.

content.text: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
content.html: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.

content.text: Features include:
content.html: Features include:

content.text: Create a Spaces Account
content.html: Create a Spaces Account

content.text: MySQL Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The MySQL exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools MySQL syllabus.
content.html: The MySQL exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools MySQL syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified MySQL Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified MySQL Developer" Certification.

content.text: The certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach MySQL?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach MySQL?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
